title: IS_VEHICLE_WHEEL_BROKEN_OFF
content:
0xCF1BC668// IsVehicleWheelBrokenOff
BOOL IS_VEHICLE_WHEEL_BROKEN_OFF(Vehicle vehicle, int wheelIndex);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle handle.wheelIndex: The wheel index.Getter for BREAK_OFF_VEHICLE_WHEEL.Examples:Lualocal vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId())

if DoesEntityExist(vehicle) then
  local isWheelBroken = IsVehicleWheelBrokenOff(vehicle, 1)
  print("Is wheel 1 broken? ", isWheelBroken)
end
codeBlocks:
// IsVehicleWheelBrokenOff
BOOL IS_VEHICLE_WHEEL_BROKEN_OFF(Vehicle vehicle, int wheelIndex);

local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId())

if DoesEntityExist(vehicle) then
  local isWheelBroken = IsVehicleWheelBrokenOff(vehicle, 1)
end
